entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
